sn24.7:1.2: “Kismim nu kho, bhikkhave, sati, kim upadaya, kim abhinivissa evam ditthi uppajjati:
sn24.7:1.5: Natthi hetu, natthi paccayo sattanam visuddhiya.
sn24.7:1.7: Natthi balam natthi viriyam natthi purisathamo natthi purisaparakkamo.
sn24.7:1.8: Sabbe satta sabbe pana sabbe bhuta sabbe jiva avasa abala aviriya niyatisangatibhavaparinata chasvevabhijatisu sukhadukkham patisamvedenti’”ti?
sn24.7:2.1: “Rupe kho, bhikkhave, sati, rupam upadaya, rupam abhinivissa evam ditthi uppajjati:
sn24.7:2.7: vinnane sati, vinnanam upadaya, vinnanam abhinivissa evam ditthi uppajjati:
sn24.7:3.4: viparinamadhammam, api nu tam anupadaya evam ditthi uppajjeyya:
sn24.7:3.13: api nu tam anupadaya evam ditthi uppajjeyya:
sn24.7:3.17: “Yampidam dittham sutam mutam vinnatam pattam pariyesitam anuvicaritam manasa tampi niccam va aniccam va”ti?
sn24.7:3.19: api nu tam anupadaya evam ditthi uppajjeyya:
sn24.7:4.1: “Yato kho, bhikkhave, ariyasavakassa imesu ca thanesu kankha pahina hoti, dukkhepissa kankha pahina hoti …pe… dukkhanirodhagaminiya patipadayapissa kankha pahina hoti—
sn24.7:4.2: ayam vuccati, bhikkhave, ariyasavako sotapanno avinipatadhammo niyato sambodhiparayano”ti.
